alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:05AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...SLOW MOVING SHOWERS WITH HEAVY RAIN CONTINUE OVER NORTHWESTERN CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHWESTERN ERIE AND CENTRAL CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES... At 602 AM EDT, an area of showers and isolated thunderstorms producing heavy rain was located along a line extending from near Gowanda to 8 miles southeast of Fredonia to 7 miles northeast of Findley Lake. Movement was east at 10 mph. Some locations over northern Chautauqua county from Fredonia eastward have seen locally over an inch of rain in the last hour. Locations impacted include... Fredonia, Westfield, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Mayville, Long Point State Park, Chautauqua Institution, Chautauqua, Concord, Collins, Sheridan, Ripley, Stockton, Dayton, Mina, Arkwright, Sherman, Forestville, Cassadaga, and South Dayton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 58 and 59. Interstate 86 between exits 6 and 7. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these showers and storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
